Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class CharacterStep

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.CharacterStep
public class CharacterStep extends Object
Represents set of named parameters for a Character card effect step. Which parameters each card takes is detailed in the card's documentation.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • setParameter

      public void setParameter(String name, String value)
      Adds a key-value pair to the object. If a key with that name already exists it wil be overwritten.
      Parameters:
      name - parameter name
      value - parameter value
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null

    • getParameter

      public String getParameter(String name)
      Returns the values associated with the given name. If there is none, null is returned
      Parameters:
      name - the name to search
      Returns:
      the String associated to name or null

    • getParameterAsIslandIndex

      int getParameterAsIslandIndex(String name, ActionPhase phase) throws InvalidCharacterParameterException
      Interpret the value of the parameter with the given name as a Island index verify that it is valid in the context of the given ActionPhase.
      Parameters:
      name - parameter name
      phase - ActionPhase from where to retrieve the Island
      Returns:
      the Island index
      Throws:
      InvalidCharacterParameterException - if name is not in the map
      InvalidCharacterParameterException - if the value corresponding to name is not a valid integer
      InvalidCharacterParameterException - if the index corresponding to name is not a valid Island index
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null

    • getParameterAsColor

      PieceColor getParameterAsColor(String name) throws InvalidCharacterParameterException
      Casts the parameter with the given name to a PieceColor.
      Parameters:
      name - parameter name
      Returns:
      PieceColor corresponding
      Throws:
      InvalidCharacterParameterException - if name isn't in the map or the value corresponding to it is not a valid PieceColor
      IllegalArgumentException - if name is null

    • getValue

      private String getValue(String name) throws InvalidCharacterParameterException
      Private helper to retrieve a parameter value. If the key is not found, InvalidCharacterParameterException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      name - parameter name
      Returns:
      the parameter value
      Throws:
      InvalidCharacterParameterException - if no parameter with the given name is stored in the object

    • formatExceptionMessage

      private String formatExceptionMessage(String name, String value)
      Helper that formats the exception message
      Parameters:
      name - name of the parameter
      value - value of the parameter
      Returns:
      formatted Exception message
